name: Data Access Security Campaign Reminder
description: Remind user that a data access security certification review task is waiting for them.
subject: Reminder: An Access Certification task is awaiting your review, final due date: $campaignReminder.dueDate
body:
Hi,

An Access Certification task is awaiting your review. The review must be completed by $campaignReminder.dueDate.
Please follow the link to view the task.

Additional task details:

Campaign Name: $campaignReminder.name
Description: $campaignReminder.description
Instructions: $campaignReminder.instructions

Thank You!

This is an automated message sent to you by Data Access Security - Please do not reply.
